com.glmapview

Class GLMapMarkerLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glmapview.GLMapMarkerLayer

  • public class GLMapMarkerLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    GLMapMarkerLayer displays big number of markers with given style. It supports marker clustering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Initializes GLMapMarkerLayer with given vector objects and `style`

      Initializes GLMapMarkerLayer with given markers and `styleCollection`

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLMapMarkerLayer

        public GLMapMarkerLayer(java.lang.Object[] markers,
                        GLMapMarkerStyleCollection styleCollection)
        Initializes GLMapMarkerLayer with given markers and `styleCollection`
        Parameters:
        markers - Array of marker objects. Usually you set objects with data, that you need to display on map.
        styleCollection - A style collection object used to display markers.

      • GLMapMarkerLayer

        public GLMapMarkerLayer(GLMapVectorObjectList objects,
                        GLMapVectorCascadeStyle cascadeStyle,
                        GLMapMarkerStyleCollection styleCollection)
        Initializes GLMapMarkerLayer with given vector objects and `style`
        Parameters:
        objects - Array of marker objects. Usually you set objects with data, that you need to display on map.
        cascadeStyle - A cascadeStyle that defines what style use for markers and unions
        styleCollection - A style collection object used to display markers.

    • Method Detail

      • objectsNearPoint

        public java.lang.Object[] objectsNearPoint(GLMapView mapView,
                                           MapPoint point,
                                           double distanceInPoints)
        Searches nearest object or cluster of objects at given mapView Note that GLMapView must be dispalyed on screen to calculate distances.
        Parameters:
        mapView - map view where layer is displayed
        point - point where object(s) will be searched
        distanceInPoints - maximum hit distance in points
        Returns:
        First object or cluster distance of which is not greater that given distance

      • haveObject

        public boolean haveObject(java.lang.Object marker)
        Check if given marker is added to layer
        Parameters:
        marker - marker to check
        Returns:
        true if object is in marker layer

      • modify

        public void modify(java.lang.Object[] newMarkers,
                   java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> markersToRemove,
                   java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> markersToReload,
                   boolean animated,
                   java.lang.Runnable onComplete)
        Adds or removes markers on layer
        Parameters:
        newMarkers - markers that should be added
        markersToRemove - markers that should be removed
        markersToReload - markers that should be reloaded
        animated - deleting or adding single markers will be animated
        onComplete - called when operation is finished

      • setClusteringEnabled

        public void setClusteringEnabled(boolean value)
        Enable or disable clustering for this layer. By default is `true`.
        Parameters:
        value - If `false` marker clustering will be disabled

      • setDrawOrder

        public void setDrawOrder(int drawOrder)
        Set draw order of layer before adding to GLMapView
        Parameters:
        drawOrder - draw order of layer

      • changeStyle

        public void changeStyle(GLMapMarkerStyleCollection styleCollection)
        Change style of layer
        Parameters:
        styleCollection - new style for layer

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
